user_query: I'm building a language learning app and I want to implement OCR to recognize text in different languages. Can you recommend the best OCR algorithm for this task? Additionally, could you provide the current version of the OCR service?

TaskList.description: Research and identify the best OCR algorithms suitable for recognizing text in multiple languages.
Compile a list of top-rated OCR algorithms along with their pros and cons.
Check and retrieve the current version of the chosen OCR service.
